items.badge_description:
Pröst from your friends at Punch Cigars! Earn this badge by checking any beer between September 1 and September 30. Plus, learn more about the ultimate cigar to pair with your favorite beer here:www.punchcigars.com.

For sale in the U.S. only.

Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 20 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 5!
It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That’s 95 check-ins with a photo.

items.badge_description: There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 425 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 86!

Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 175 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 36!
